item.title: Feminism
item.description: Feminism A social and political movement that advocates for the equality of all genders in all aspects of life, such as education, work, health, rights, and representation.

item.title: Gender
item.description: Gender A term that refers to the social and cultural aspects of being a man, a woman, or another gender. Gender is different from sex, which is based on biological characteristics such as chromosomes, hormones, and genitals.
